concept.title: Use a Template File
concept.shortdesc: Drawing template files contain standard settings and have a ".dwt" file extension. There are two methods provided for creating a new drawing when the systemvariable FILEDIA is set to 1. When the STARTUP is set to 1, typing NEW opens New Drawing dialog box, fromwhich you can select the desired template to create a new drawing if you click Use a Template tab.

conbody.p: When the STARTUP is set to 0, typing NEW opens Select Template dialog box, from which you can select the desired template to create a new drawing.
The changes made to a new drawing based on an existing template file do not affect the template file.
